page.title: 13SOCIAL SURVEY
page.content: WE CARRIED OUT A SURVEY OF THE COMMUNITY OF BOTH VILLAGES,THE RESULTS OF WHICH HIGHLIGHT ASPECTS OF LIFE IN THE VILLAGES.{50%}OF THE PEOPLE INTERVIEWED IN CWMPARC USE THE LOCAL BUS SERVICE WHICH HAS BEEN CUT DRASTICALLY IN RECENT MONTHS.50% USE 3 LOCAL SHOPS.MORE THAN{50%}USE TREORCHY LIBRARY.OVER{75%}USE THE PARC AND DARE THEATRE,80% VISIT THE LOCAL MARKET. ONLY{30%}NOW ATTEND LOCAL CHAPELS OR CHURCHES WHICH REFLECT A DECLINE COMPARED WITH THE PAST.AS TREORCHY IS A MUCH LARGER VILLAGE AND HAS AN EXCELLENT MAIN SHOPPING AREA MORE THAN {90%}USE ALL LOCAL SHOPS.TREORCHY OFFERS MORE FACILITIES FOR THE YOUNG EG.YOUTH CLUB,BOYS CLUB BUT MOST PEOPLE WOULD LIKE TO SEE THIS FACILITY IMPROVED,ALSO AN IMPROVED BUS AND TRAIN SERVICE,MORE EMPLOYMENT,WHILST {14%}WOULD LIKE TO LEAVE ALTOGETHER.
